info.description: Personal Finance Management API - Track expenses, manage budgets, and achieve savings goals
info.title: FityBudget API

get.description: Get comprehensive financial statistics for the dashboard
Get overall financial health score with detailed metrics
Get AI-generated financial insights and recommendations
Get income and expense flow data over specified period
Get spending breakdown by category for specified period

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information

post.description: Mark the user's onboarding process as complete

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

post.description: Create a new user account with name, email, and password

get.description: Get all budgets for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new budget with spending limit

get.description: Get overall budget summary and spending for the current month
Get a single budget by ID
Get all savings goals for the authenticated user
Get a single savings goal by ID

patch.description: Add funds to a savings goal's current amount

get.description: Get paginated list of user's transactions
Get transaction statistics for the current month
Get a single transaction by ID
Get all wallet accounts for the authenticated user
Get a single wallet by ID

put.description: Update a wallet account (can set as default)

type.description: Mobile Money, Bank, Cash, Credit, Savings

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
